actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing and directing the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to have the necessary repairs made to the mace of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Directs the Sergeant at Arms to have necessary repairs made to the mace of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing and directing the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to have the necessary repairs made to the mace of the House of Representatives.
